sent.orig: After reading the agreement, accept it by activating the [Accept] button below the text area.
sent.trans: 当你读了协议后，如果你同意，则按[Accept]按钮。

sent.orig: I cannot accept the dogma of this church; accept an argument.
sent.trans: 我不同意这个教堂的教条；同意这个论点。

sent.orig: A person will accept money only because of the belief that others will also accept it.
sent.trans: 当一个人接受货币是因为他相信别人也会接受这种货币。

sent.orig: Accept all (inactive) -the phone will accept all incoming SMS messages.
sent.trans: 接受所有（已停播）-电话将接受所有传入短信。

sent.orig: If we accept this kind of tinkering, can't we accept cloning?
sent.trans: 如果我们接受这种修补，那么我们为什么不能接受克隆呢？
